headline: Lessons From a Chinese Classroom
abstract: Observing how Chinese 2- and 3-year-olds navigated a second language, I wondered whether I could have done this for my children.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI â€” We sat in toddler-size wooden chairs around an orderly circle of Chinese 2-year-olds, busy with circle time. As a parent of three children who collectively spent 15 years in American day care, I am very familiar with circle time.
